Body.DeleteMatching: Are you sure you want to delete this matching? This action cannot be undone.
Body.WhyWeUseTests: The numbers you enter when creating or modifying a coding challenge are simply the number of static/random test cases to test the user's solution against. For example, if I set static_tests=5 and random_tests=3, then for every submission, 5 static testcases and 3 random testcases are generated, which the user's submission is tested against

WebinarCancellationByOwnerPolicy.1: If no user has booked this webinar, then you can cancel without any penalty.
WebinarCancellationByOwnerPolicy.2: If one or more user(s) have booked this webinar, then you can cancel only in case of emergencies or in case of illness. Otherwise the next webinar has to be free.

EventCancellationPolicy.1: 7 days before event or earlier: 100% refund

About.1: Full-time video-based courses in every difficulty
About.4: Completely for free, if you're helping

1.Heading: Video-based courses
1.Body: Our courses are watchable for free but do contain almost everything that is taught when studying computer science. And we're working hard to erase the 'almost'.

2.Heading: Webinars
2.Body: Sometimes, there are questions, sometimes, we need someone to tell us about their work. That's why we have webinars. Held by you for you. Held by experts for those who want to become one.

3.Heading: Coaching
3.Body: You do want that individual help, you want an expert mentoring just you? Here you go!

4.Heading: Job Offers
4.Body: At some point, you want to make money with your passion. That's why you can find great job offers on our website which you can tailor to your needs and according to your certificates.

5.Heading: Exercises
5.Body: We all love a challenges. That's why we already have a lot of coding challenges for you. But there's a lot more to come!

6.Heading: The Skill Tree
6.Body: Have you ever stood before the vast amount of coding languages and technologies and did not have the slightest idea what to learn next? That's why we designed a roadmap: The skilltree!

7.Heading: Certificates
7.Body: To apply for jobs or just for trophy hunting, there are real certificates. You don't get those for participating but for a real exam. We're working with colleges and companies to larger the benefit - and our network is growing.

1.Heading: How can I participate? How can I get MorphCoins?
1.Body: There are several possibilities to help us - and get coins: We're regularly offering small jobs, you can help me with a certain video, you can host a webinar, become a coach or an examiner or you can help us with finding and repairing bugs. More details are

2.Heading: Is MorphCoin a cryptocurrency?
2.Body: No. It is a pure site-internal currency.

3.Heading: Your vlogs are not a skill here. Why?
3.Body: We're planning for integrating a whole new part for learning security awareness, but we did not want to keep everyone waiting. If you have some cool ideas, feel free to contact me.

4.Heading: I want to host a webinar. How?
4.Body: You first need to get that skill certified, so we can be sure, you actually know, what you're talking about. Then you need a certificate for some soft skills. After that, you can at any time you like.

5.Heading: I already studied computer science. Can I get my skills certified?
5.Body: Sure. Contact us! We need to do that manually so we know, it's true. That's why we need a few MorphCoins for it.

1.Heading: Buy MorphCoins
1.Body: You can buy MorphCoins using euros from shop.

2.Heading: Jobs
2.Body: Do jobs that are hosted from us. What you have to do differs greatly and what you get varies with the task you fullfil. You can find all the info in the jobs detail page. How about writing the code for a coding challenge?

3.Heading: Lectures
3.Body: Provide everything for a lecture. You still have that code of your last python project where you use cool libs? Or you just installed something on your server and created screenshots or even a video of every step you took? Send it over and I'll share it with the community. However, please be aware that this info will be public then! So you're transferring rights to me, meaning you first have to have those! So please, only original work. And if I have to fix too many bugs, I'll have to reduce your reward.

4.Heading: Webinars
4.Body: Host webinars as an instructor. You're an expert, maybe already did some jobs and want to share your knowledge in webinars? Contact me, if you've got the skills, I'm happy to have you. You yourself decide about the prices you take from the participants. You keep 80%! Only limitation: The webinar may not be for free - you know, we do want to keep developing this site.

5.Heading: Coach
5.Body: Apply and become a coach. Want to help people individually? You only need the skills you want to coach, some soft skills and you can start. Rates are totally up to you!

6.Heading: Bug Bounty
6.Body: Find Bugs of any sorts and report those. You're hacker or you just found a bug, a security vulnerability or a mistake in text or ordering of any sorts? Use the Icon on the right to report it to us! Depending on the severity, you get a reward. Disclaimer: You may NOT use any services, that might crash the server or network or count as denial of service tools! All data you might have access to, need to be removed immediately(!) and completely from your systems. Data on our systems may NOT be changed! Please try to keep other user out of this, try and exploit yourselves, if it is a user based exploit. Also, please limit yourselves to the Bootstrap Academy. Everything that's not from the academy is out of scope. Example: We use Youtube videos, but we don't own Youtube, so it's out of scope. Also: Only the first reporter will be rewarded and if you are a third party provider, there will probably be no reward. Speaking of rewards: Rewards are most commonly paid out in morphcoins. The amount is defined by the severity of the bug and the quality of the report and how easy you make it for us to fix it. In cases where we discussed that you do bug hunting for us, a payout in euro is possible. Please contact us, if you want this BEFORE you search for a bug!

7.Heading: Examiner
7.Body: Apply and become an examiner. You can guess how well some can code? You know all the questions to put someone to test? Contact me as an examiner - you only need the according skill and some soft skills
